Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Economists believe cost of living spending measures in the federal budget will drive up inflation but moves to improve the budget bottom line have been well directed. Criticisms have been levelled at the government for changes to taxes on the gas industry with the crossbench calling for stronger taxes driving revenue for cost of living relief. Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has met with Labor party faithful in Canberra saying the government will deliver a fiscally responsible budget that lowers inflation and the cost of living.
